name: Luna Fantasy
description:
A new social MMORPG is online! Luna Fantasy is happy to join the mobile platform, so it can join you everywhere you go. Enter a world full of friendly games, warm virtual environments, and adventures full of excitement. Are you ready?

- Choose from two races, three different careers, and hundreds of clothing items.
The three major careers are warriors, mages, and assassins. Each profession has it’s own rich features, as well as a variety of races: elves and humans. Plus, more than 100 kinds of headwear, outfits, and decorations to express yourself. Blueland welcomes uniqueness.

- Get a Pet
Alpacas, slime balloons, vulture beasts, small turtles, toy dogs, and flying radishes, there are more than 50 kinds of mounts can be trained. Not only can we take a ride on your mounts, but we can cultivate all kinds of skills and become a good comrade in arms.

- Clans, Marriages, and cross server play, Lonely no longer
The brave people can work together with more than 100 clans, meet friends to battle with together, the marriage system is more unique, in front of your beloved half of the flowers and careful care, you can tie the knot in Blueland!

-It's fun to take a picture of a dance, and laugh until you drop
In the game, the classical dance system is completely transplanted. More than 30 dance steps are can be learned. Go to the square and dance with other players to enjoy the fun. The cool photo system can take the lovely photos of all your friends and collect the most precious memories you make.

- Home cottage to grow vegetables to enjoy life EASY
The rich system enables the players to live a good life in Blueland. Everyone has his own personal cabin, his own fields to grow vegetables in, and up to 35 friends can help you water your flowers, little prankster friends may steal your food though! Decorate your furniture to style your own bedroom. Invite everyone to have fun house party!！
